mapper.insert: insert into mac_order (m_id, c_id, t_id, o_price, u_id,amount) values (#{mId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{oPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{amount,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update mac_order set s_id = #{sid} where o_id = #{oid}
mapper.select: SELECT o.o_id,m.m_name,m_img_url,c.c_name,t.t_name,o.o_price,o.amount,s.s_name,u_name from mac_order o LEFT JOIN mac_goods m on o.m_id = m.m_id LEFT JOIN mac_color c on m.c_id = c.c_id LEFT JOIN mac_type t on m.t_id = t.t_id LEFT JOIN mac_status s on o.s_id = s.s_id LEFT JOIN mac_user u on o.u_id = u.u_id WHERE o.u_id = #{uid}
